title: The Fork
description: A website for a fictional restaurant on the shores of Lake Geneva in Switzerland.

title: Neptunia
description: A simple onepage made by a group of students in less than 8 hours.

title: iOS 6
description: A mini web-app to imitate the calculator that was on iOS 6.

title: The Button
description: An advanced submit button that react to the content and the other elements.

title: Plex Home Theater
description: A NodeJS app that turn on or off your Philips Hue lights when you play or stop a movie on plex.

title: Snitch
description: The first french-community based website to snitch on bad behavior on minecraft servers.
